assessScore.success: Congratulations! This is a good assessment!
assessScore.tooLow: The score of your assessment of this submission is too low. Please carefully review the grading criteria and the submission again, and submit your improved assessment.
assessScore.tooHigh: The score of your assessment of this submission is too high. Please carefully review the grading criteria and the submission again, and submit your improved assessment.
